#343

- Growing individually on well-decayed hardwood log in deep, wet mixed oak/hickory woodland draw.
- Cap yellow, lightly hirsute on orangish margin (with brown hairs).
- Lamellae yellow with frequent partial gills.
- Stipe fleshy becoming larger at base.

Additional Info
- Smell: faint
- Taste: bitter
- KOH red on pileipellis and lamellae and light red on stipe.
